body.bibl: Heijer, Johannes den, and Andrea B. Schmidt. “Scripts Beyond Borders: Allographic Traditions and Their Social, Cultural and Philological Aspects. An Analytical Introduction.” In Scripts Beyond Borders: A Survey of Allographic Traditions in the Euro-Mediterranean World, edited by Johannes den Heijer, Andrea B. Schmidt, and Tamara Pataridze, 1–64. Publications de l’Institut Orientaliste de Louvain 62. Louvain: Peeters, 2014.

An Analytical Introduction, in Scripts Beyond Borders: A Survey of Allographic Traditions in the Euro-Mediterranean World, ed. Johannes den Heijer, Andrea B. Schmidt, and Tamara Pataridze, Publications de l’Institut Orientaliste de Louvain 62 (Louvain: Peeters, 2014), 1–64.
